column5: ....slime our boats big time this year and achieve a PB.  May we avoid the rocks and not have any  engine problems that result in being stranded.  May we encounter the problem of not having a big enough net on board.  May the boat we are in be able to withstand the waves of a sudden storm.  May we step out and take the time to help a fellow boater in trouble. Have a good year Guys.
